Mendokusai

Tartarus

Time

25 Oct 2017

I wish I had more time... time to learn to code, to learn Spanish, to learn Japanese, to learn about crypto, to play videogames, to watch other people play videogames, to learn to play guitar, to read books, to binge youtube videos. Only having 16 hours of consciousness a day is frustrating. Perhaps I should try polyphasic sleep?
